about_the_game:
Embrace the Challenge

Plan your path and manage your Bits strategically to survive and conquer your adventure!

Overcome Electrifying Hazards

The unforgiving motherboard will do anything it takes to keep you from infiltrating it's processor. From electric floors to deadly energy surges, adapt your strategies to tackle challenges and enemies that stand in your way.

Strategize Your Path

Plan your adventure carefully, choosing the best approach to overcome frequent hazards.

Master the Bits System

Inspired by classic arcade simplicity and code, the Bits System consolidates resource management into one engaging mechanic. Bits are your lifeline, serving as your ammunition, health, and abilities cost. Every Bit counts, strategize and use them wisely.

Strategic Depth

A high Bit count not only increases your power but also directly ups your high score.

Discover Hidden Treasures

Seek out bits and weapons scattered throughout the motherboard. Destroy chips and uncover packaged bit files or file folders as you explore.

Embark on a perilous PC hardware adventure!

Dive into a sprawling, third-person open-world game set in a vibrant and hostile motherboard world.

Face electrifying hazards and battle a variety of foes lurking around every corner as you navigate this intricate digital landscape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.8ghz+ 4+ cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970 using desktop / 1080 using laptop
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed to be lightweight.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10 or newer
  • Processor: 3.1ghz+ 6+ cores, Faster is better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2070 / 5700XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Features adjustable graphics settings.

reviews:
“Engaging Concept: The idea of navigating a computer’s internal components and facing digital-themed hazards and enemies is innovative and engaging. Visuals: The graphics are colorful and well-designed, enhancing the overall immersive experience. a game driven by exploration and discovery, where players navigate a vibrant and interactive environment inspired by classic games like Pacman, Galaga, and Super Mario.”
GamesArdor
short_description: Enter a vibrant universe full of microchips and nanobots. Explore the surface of a computer's internal components and survive against it's unique inhabitants in this engaging digital adventure.
